definition: to do as one sees fit/It's up to you./Let's wait and see and then decide what to do.
to look at/to see/to see (a doctor)/to visit
(chess) move/trick/all right!/(dialect) to add
to wear (clothes)/to contact/to use/to apply
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with
thus/in this way/like this
to do as one sees fit/to play it by ear (according to the circumstances)
let's talk about the unpleasant things first/let's be frank

definition: no matter (who, what etc)
You figure it out for yourself./Do as you please.
to know the score (idiom)/to be well aware of the situation
in my opinion
to do one's best/to shape up/to behave/to fend for oneself/you're on your own
undue trouble/Thank you for having gone out of your way to help me.
not to mince words/not to beat about the bush

definition: to have no right or ability to interfere in sth/it's none of your business!
I/me/my/(often used in early vernacular literature)
I/me/we/my home/our house
to persuade using all possible arguments (idiom); to act good cop and bad cop in turn
to decide/to make decisions/to take responsibility (for deciding)/to be in charge/to give sb justice
